name: The Hunger Games: Mockingjay - Part 1: The Propos Team
detailed_description: Aiding Katniss in her quest to defeat President Snow and the Capitol is her Propos team; consisting of Cressida, Messalla, Castor and Pollux. Together, they create stirring propaganda videos to not only incite the districts, but also be a painful thorn in Snow’s side. Here we will discover just who the Propos Team are in the actors’ own words and the vital role the Propos themselves play in the film’s narrative.
